content: Phase 1 POC: Get email integration playbook and web scraping approach
Phase 1 POC: Create backend POC endpoints for external data scraping (services & clients)
Phase 1 POC: Implement contact form endpoint with DB storage and email notification
Phase 1 POC: Create test_core.py to validate all POC functionality
Phase 1 POC: Fix and iterate until all POC tests pass
Phase 1 POC: All user stories covered and validated
Phase 2: Get design guidelines from design agent
Phase 2: Build complete backend with all models, auth, CRUD APIs
Phase 2: Build complete frontend with all pages, routing, 3D effects
Phase 2: Create test admin user for admin panel access
Phase 2: End to End Testing using Testing Agent
Phase 2: Fix all bugs reported by testing agent
Phase 2: All user stories covered in Development and testing
